definitions.title: n.pr.gent. Chaldean
definitions.body: (v. BH [[כַשְׂדִּים]]);—abs. ´[[כ]]: Da 2:10; emph. [[כשדיא]] Da 5:30 Kt (Qr [[כַּשְׂדָּאָה]]), [[כסדיא]] Ezr 5:12 Kt (Qr [[כַּסְדָּאָה]]); pl. abs. [[כַּשְׂדָּאִין]] Ezr 3:8, Ezr 5:11, emph. [[כשדיא]] Kt, [[כַּשְׂדָּאֵי]] Qr, Da 2:5, Da 2:10, Da 4:4, Da 5:7;—
Chaldean By race Da 3:8, Da 5:30, Ezr 5:12.
as learned, of the class of Magi (BH ´[[כ]]:
